divs: sighting details@ 10:00 spotted super bright starlike \ plane light in nw sky, it dimmed to smaller than star the 4x brighter than venus until about 10:30 it dimmed a total of 5-7x
trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Hickory
There was one other sighting in Hickory on or around March 24th 2012
Summary: Starlike/ plane light like at first, Very bright 4x brighter than venus, then dims to less bright than small star then back again super bright.
